data.title: Farouk al
data.meta_description: Farouk al-Sharaa is a Syrian politician and diplomat. He was one of the most prominent officials in the Syrian government and served as foreign minister of Syria from 1984 until 2006 when he became Vice President of Syria. His term as Vice President of Syria ended on 19 July 2014.
